item.title: Spark Alert Relay: Revolutionizing School Safety with Automation
item.description: Schools face unique safety challenges that require rapid, coordinated responses to mitigate harm to students and staff. With 911Cellular’s newest innovation, Spark Alert Relay, schools can automate critical safety responses that traditionally required manual intervention. With Spark, physical security measures like alarms, PA announcements and building lockdowns can be immediately activated upon receiving a panic signal, significantly reducing response time during an emergency.
